Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wacker/Harbor
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker & Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker and Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Reroute near Kedzie/Walnut
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie buses temp. rerouted NB: Kedzie, Washington, Homan, Franklin and Kedzie ;SB: Kedzie, Franklin, Homan, Warren and Kedzie near Kedzie/Walnut.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Kedzie/Walnut due to street blockage near Kedzie/Walnut.

Northbound buses will operate via Kedzie, Washington, Homan, Franklin and Kedzie including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Kedzie, Franklin, Homan, Warren and Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Constance
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Stony Island, 76th, Jeffery and 79th: due to, street blockage near 79th/Constance.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Stony Island, 76th, Jeffery and 79th: due to, street blockage near 79th/Constance.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Garfield. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Garfield.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
